tool_description: Generate QRCode for your different use cases
name: QRCode Generator
title: QRCode Generator

api_list.name: Generate QRCode
api_list.description: Generate QR code for simple text/string like link to a website
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://qrcode-generator13.p.rapidapi.com/v1/qrcode/generate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "qrcode-generator13.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://qrcode-generator13.p.rapidapi.com/v1/qrcode/generate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

print(response.json())
